Name: Dreamy Dorini Smoking Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini (small) glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As the name implies, this Martini is a good helping of smoky peat. And, if you like that kind of thing, it's equally dreamy.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Audrey Saunders in 2003 at Beacon restaurant in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Dreamy Dorini Smoking Martini contains 157 calories
